text: Use it as a tool, not a replacement:
description: GitHub Copilot is a powerful tool that can help you write code faster and more efficiently, but it's important to remember that it's not a replacement for your own knowledge and expertise. Always review the code generated by Copilot and make sure it meets your requirements and standards.

The quality of the suggestions generated by Copilot depends on the quality of the prompts you provide. Make sure your prompts are clear, specific, and provide enough context for Copilot to understand what you're trying to accomplish.

Copilot may suggest code that contains security vulnerabilities or other issues. Always review the code generated by Copilot and make sure it's secure and meets your organization's security standards.

Copilot can generate a lot of code quickly, which can make it easy to lose track of what you're doing. Make sure to keep your code organized and well-documented, and use best practices like modularization and version control to keep your codebase manageable.

text: Use it to learn and explore:
description: Copilot can be a great tool for learning new programming concepts and exploring new ideas. Use it to experiment with new approaches and techniques, and to expand your knowledge and skills.
